mobs.LongDesc: Leon stands here glaring at you with a nasty expression on his face.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A hulking man named Leon stands before you.  Dressed in the utility scrubs
worn by Waste Disposal Engineers, he stands nervously shifting his weight
from one foot to the other.  His hair is thinning and he has a thick moustache.

mobs.LongDesc: Holden sits here adjusting the Voight-Kampff machine.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Holden has the look of a Blade Runner - lean, intense, and with a
predatory gleam in his eyes.  His eyes watch you warily while he makes
adjustments on the Voight-Kampff machine.  The bulge under his arm is 
reason enough to stay friendly with the man and you hope he
doesn't ask you to take the test.

mobs.LongDesc: Gaff stares at you blankly while he makes tiny origami figures.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Gaff is wearing a dark trenchcoat with a silver bowtie.  He is wearing a
porkpie hat that casts his pock-marked face in shadow.  While he stares at you
with dead eyes, his fingers are busily folding tiny pieces of tinfoil
into beautiful origami figures.

mobs.LongDesc: Chew is standing here shivering in the cold.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Chew is a short, oriental man dressed in an immense fur coat that is
connected to some sort of heating device.  You can see his breath in
the air as he breathes which has caused ice to form on his moustache.
He is wearing some sort of optic headgear and mutters to himself
incessantly.

mobs.LongDesc: Doctor Eldon Tyrell peers at you calmly through thick glasses.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Doctor Eldon Tyrell's face is familiar to you since he is one of the
richest and most famous men in the world.  The founder of the Tyrell
Corporation is a thin, middle-aged man with slicked-back hair and
thick glasses.  He is wearing a dark tuxedo with a white bow tie and
looks at you with a calm, curious expression.

mobs.LongDesc: Rick Deckard stands here wondering if you are a replicant.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Rick Deckard is an athletic man in his mid-thirties who is wearing a
tan trench coat and an intense expression.  He has a grey shirt and an
odd brown tie that draws attention away from the bulge under his arm.
He looks tired but wary and dangerous.

mobs.LongDesc: Zhora shakes the water from her hair and glares at you angrily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Zhora is a tall, statuesque woman who is stunningly beautiful.  Her
soft curves cannot disguise the hard muscles beneath.  Her hair is
wet and she looks like she has just recently taken a shower.  An angry
look crosses her face as you find her hiding in the shower, and she
tenses and moves slowly towards you.

mobs.LongDesc: Taffy Lewis looks self-important and ignores you completely.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The proprietor of Taffy Lewis' sits here at the bar looking important
and smug.  One of the richest men in Chinatown, Taffy has many illegal
side businesses besides his famous nightclub.  His expensive tuxedo
looks slightly worn as does he.  Taffy appears to enjoy being the
center of attention.

mobs.LongDesc: Abdul ben Hassan sits serenely amid his beloved snakes.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Abdul Hassan is a portly egyptian wearing a white suite with a red fez.
A magvisor is perched on his head as he sits amid his genetic engineering
equipment.  He peers at you intently, wondering if you can afford his
high quality, replicated snakes.

mobs.LongDesc: Pris does a few backflips and lands right in front of you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Pris is young, blonde, beautiful, and very voluptuous.  She is dressed
in a very exotic and revealing outfit that makes you wonder if
she is a working girl.  She has a band of black makeup across her eyes
that gives her a racoon-like appearance.  She moves gracefully and
lightly on her feet and looks lost.

mobs.LongDesc: The bartender is busy mixing drinks and taking money.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The bartender is a short, muscular man whose eyes move across the drinks
and money on the bar constantly.  He expertly mixes drinks, accepts
money, and talks to the patrons all at the same time.  He is wearing a
red jacket with the name 'LOUIE' written on the pocket.

mobs.LongDesc: Roy Batty stands here menacingly with an evil glint in his eye.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Roy Batty has shocking white hair and a sly, malicious expression.
He is heavily built and moves with surprising silence.  He is wearing
a long trench coat and looks wet from walking in the rain.  His gaze
goes right through you and you wonder if he is a replicant.

mobs.LongDesc: Inspector Bryant sits here looking at you appraisingly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Inspector Bryant is wearing a drab safari outfit and looks every bit the
part of a tired police inspector.  He is slightly pudgy with thinning
hair and an even thinner moustache.  He has bags under his eyes yet he
smiles at you with an expression that makes you feel uncomfortable.

mobs.LongDesc: A lovely woman named Rachel stands here cooly smoking a cigarette.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Rachel is breathtakingly beautiful with dark hair and large, dark eyes.
She is dressed in an exquisitely tailored black silk suit that somehow
manages to enhance her already perfect figure.  She looks exotic and
mysterious as she slowly puffs on a tiny black cigarette.

mobs.LongDesc: J. F. Sebastian glances at you shyly as he begins to move away.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
J. F. Sebastian is one of the premier genetic designers for the Tyrell
Corporation.  Still on earth because of his Methuselah's Syndrome, he
quietly works on creating complete organisms for his boss with whom he
also plays an occasional game of chess.  He is very short and looks
at you shyly with a trace of fear in his eyes.

mobs.LongDesc: An odd, tiny man dressed in a Prussian uniform stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The kaiser is obviously a genetically engineered creature.  The size of
a small child, he has a huge nose and long moustache.  He looks rather
funny as he walks around stiffly in a tiny Prussian uniform, complete
with a spiked helmet.

mobs.LongDesc: A large stuffed bear dressed in a Napoleonic uniform stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The General looks like a large stuffed bear but is amazingly
alive.  He is dressed in a red and white Napoleonic uniform complete with a
tricorn hat and a tiny sword.  He struts around stiffly in his shiny
black boots and sneezes occasionally.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge bouncer stands before the nightclub.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This bouncer may at one time been a professional wrestler or a tackle in
the National Football League.  Massively muscular, his shaven head gleams
with sweat as he eyes the crowd with a nasty leer.  Since Taffy Lewis
can afford the best, you know this guy can take care of business.  Best
not piss him off . . .

mobs.LongDesc: A large owl sits here calmly on a perch looking over the room.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This huge barn owl has beautiful black and white feathers with large,
luminous orange eyes.  It perches perfectly still, although occasionally
it moves it head suddenly or its eyes blink.  It's talons look very
lethal and it seems to be watching your every move.

mobs.LongDesc: A massive experimental combat model replicant stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This male replicant is massively muscled and nearly seven feet tall.
As you enter, he glares at you with an unpleasant look on his face and
stop pacing back and forth in his cell.  With a calculating look on his
face, he begins to move towards you.

mobs.LongDesc: An experimental pilot replicant stands ready here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This male replicant is somewhat diminutive, in order to fit well into
cramped fighter cockpits you figure.  He moves with amazing quickness
and you realize that his reflexes have been significantly enhanced.
His eyes have an odd glow about them and you wonder what he can see
with them.  He seems to be wondering why you are here and if it would
be worthwhile trying to escape.

mobs.LongDesc: An experimental pleasure replicant smiles seductively at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This beautiful female replicant seems to be the enbodiment of every man's
dream of a perfect woman.  Tall and athletic, she has long black hair 
and startling green eyes.  Graceful and voluptuous she moves slowly
toward you with a slight smile on her face.

mobs.LongDesc: The Chemist sits here ready to make a deal.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Chemist is a very old man of undeterminate heritage.  His skin is
pockmarked and scarred, and he is wearing black rubber gloves over 
his gnarled hands.  He is wearing a stained lab coat and looks alarmed
at your presence on his boat.

mobs.LongDesc: A Eurasian trader has something illegal to sell.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young Eurasian man is very young.  He appears very nervous and
agitated, probably from a heavy dose of neural stimulants.  His oversize
clothing and long coat could be hiding anything from weapons to illegal
human organs.  Don't turn your back on him, he looks violent and
desperate.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge, black hooded-cobra slithers across the floor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This unusually large cobra is almost five feet long.  Thick and scaled
with black, glossy skin, the venomous snake has glittering gold eyes
that stare unblinking at you.

mobs.LongDesc: A Chinese businessman is busy eating a bowl of noodles.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This businessman is well dressed, wearing a formal suit and a heavy 
topcoat.  He has a corporate logo tatooed to his forehead indicating
that he is a member of the executive class.  He is eating methodically
without appearing to enjoy his meal.

mobs.LongDesc: A corporate courier is waiting to place his order.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This courier looks nervous and agitated, probably from the neural
stimulants that couriers are known for taking.  He is dressed in a gore-tex
biking outfit that has kelvar panels sewn into it.  He glances at you with
a nasty expression and turns back impatiently.

mobs.LongDesc: An overworked cook stands here sweating over his woks.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The cook looks overworked and overheated.  His face is red and sweating
from the steam rising from the woks arrayed before him.  His hands move in
a blur stirring, adding ingredients, and dumping completed dishes into
cracked porcelain bowls.  His concentration is fierce and he completely
ignores you as he cooks.

mobs.LongDesc: A thin Hare Krishna shuffles by muttering to himself.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This terribly thin man is wearing the typical saffron robes and prayer
beads of the Hare Krishna sect that is popular in Los Angeles.  His face is
set in a look of religious ecstasy, or perhaps he has had too much opium.
You try to avoid eye contact in case he is selling something.

mobs.LongDesc: A bloated wharf rat waddles along looking for food.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This extremely large rat is almost as large as an oppossum.  It's pink
tail is almost a foot long and its body is easily a foot and a half.  It has
large, prominent teeth and eyes that look like black marbles.  It does not
appear to be afraid of anything, including you.

mobs.LongDesc: A nervous-looking pickpocket is looking for an easy mark.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This thin, hungry-looking man looks extremely agitated and nervous.  He
moves continually, never stopping, and appears to twitch and tremble.  You
know that he is on some sort of stimulants and you try to keep away from him.

mobs.LongDesc: A very drunk man stands here unsteadily, swaying from side to side.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is dressed in a beautifully tailored business suit.  He is
shuffling slightly, trying to keep his balance.  His eyes are blood
red and he is sweating heavily.  A strong odor of Vodka surrounds
him as it appears that he has dribbled as much down his shirt as
he has poured into his belly.

mobs.LongDesc: The DJ is busy mixing the tunes for the dance floor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The DJ is a young, thin man with very long hair and extremelyl white
skin.  You figure that he rarely sees the light of day but spends most
of his time with his mixers and reverb units.  His face is slack-jawed
and expressionless, but his fingers fly nimbly across the controls of
his huge equipment rack.

mobs.LongDesc: The building manager sits here keeping an eye on the security monitors.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The building manager is an elderly man who looks rather frail and
tired.  He is wearing a threadbare old suit that is badly in need of
a good dry cleaning.  He is keeping a close eye on the bank of security
monitors that are behind the desk and barely glances at you.

mobs.LongDesc: A bored-looking salesgirl glances at you for a moment.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young salesgirl looks bored to death, probably because you are
her first customer all week.  She is fairly attractive and has very
long hair that she plays with constantly.  She tries to stifle a yawn
and a hint of a smile crosses her face as you enter the store.  She
quickly glances away and begins playing with her hair some more.

mobs.LongDesc: A teenage girl avoids eye contact with you as she walks by.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young girl looks like she is about sixteen years old.  She is
dressed in some antique jeans and a sweat shirt with Pittsburgh
Steelers written on it.  You wonder who in the world are the
Pittsburgh Steelers?  You figure it must be some new gang.

mobs.LongDesc: An artificial poisonous viper slithers into view.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This massive snake is over six feet long and is as big around as your
arm.  Its camouflage coloration and infrared-enhanced optic implants
identify it as an artificially produced security replicant.
These very expensive snakes are extremely deadly and difficult to kill.

mobs.LongDesc: An old man sits here reading a newspaper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This elderly gentleman looks extremely old.  He is warmly dressed and
is wearing glasses that magnify his rheumy eyes.  His lower lip trembles
constantly and he continuously coughs and clears his throat.  He is
reading a wrinkled newspaper and mumbling quietly to himself.

mobs.LongDesc: A junkie coughs and looks at you with a nasty smile.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This foul-smelling creature is obviously a serious addict.  Although
fairly young, the man looks aged and bent from the ravagaes of the highly
addictive drugs that are commonly available.  Boils cover his face and his
dirty fingernails have been filed to nasty, dagger-like points.  He is
thinking about all of the things he can buy after he kills you.

mobs.LongDesc: A gorgeous receptionist smiles at you expectantly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
There is only one word that describes this woman:  Goddess!  She is the
most spectacularly beautiful woman you have ever seen.  Only the Tyrell
Corporation could hire such a gorgeous creature to man the receptionist's
desk in their lobby.  You can't help but wonder if she is human, or is
she a spectacular feat in genetic engineering.

mobs.LongDesc: A Tyrell Corporation guard demands to see your visitors pass.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Tyrell Corporation guard is a hulking man with heavy musculature
and a lean, aggressive look.  He is dressed in combat utilities and is
heavily armed.  He is probably glaring at you from behind his mirrored
sunglasses but you can't tell for sure.  He is standing perfectly
motionless and doesn't say a word.

mobs.LongDesc: A pretty hostess smiles at you, hoping you'll buy her a drink.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This lovely creature looks beautiful at first glance in the dim
light but you quickly realize that she is much older than you
originally thought.  Dressed to kill, she looks tired and bored but
smiles at you with an alluring look that must be well practiced.
She is probably one of Taffy's girls and is here to make customers
buy lots of drinks.

mobs.LongDesc: The butcher looks at you, planning out your dismemberment.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The butcher is a short, squat man with long, greasy hair.  He is
wearing a blood-stained apron that you can smell from the other side
of the car.  He is constantly testing the edge of a huge cleaver
that he is wielding, and breathes with an odd, choking sound.  This
grotesque creature could be a mutant.

mobs.LongDesc: A gang enforcer flexes and moves towards you with an ugly sneer.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy is huge and nasty!  You can't believe the amount of muscles, scars, and
leather that he has.  As a gang tank, or enforcer, this guy most certainly is
a ruthless and skilled streetfighter.  Better keep your distance from him, and
definitely don't piss him off.

mobs.LongDesc: A hot gang mama licks her lips and sizes you up.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This somewhat used by still hot-looking woman could be anywhere from 18 to 28,
you just can't tell.  She is dressed in a leather miniskirt, a cropped off
tshirt and, of course, a heavy leather jacket.  Massive hoop earrings glitter
under her long, dark hair and she walks like a queen in her scuffed up combat
boots.  You can't quite decide if she turns you on or not!

mobs.LongDesc: A stoned gang member looks right through you and says, "Oh wow."
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This gang member has obviously been using some sort of powerful drug.  His eyes
are blood red, his jaw is slack, and he is trembling slightly.  His skin is pale
and a sheen of sweat covers his brow.  He is mumbling quietly to himself, and
is staring at some imagined scene that only he can see.  His gaze is directed
at you and it makes you rather uncomfortable.

mobs.LongDesc: A gang wannabe shakes her long hair and tries to look tough.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young teenage girl looks like she is trying awfully hard to look mean and
tough.  The harsh makeup and the rough clothes can't hide the fact that she
is probably only 15 or 16 and for some reason wants to hang out with the gang.
She is chewing gum and snapping it constantly and keeps twisting her hair
around her finger.

mobs.LongDesc: The gang leader stares at you through mirrored sunglasses and laughs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy is obviously the leader of the subway gang and everyone keeps glancing
in his direction.  He looks very confident and very dangerous but he doesn't
move a muscle despite your uninvited presence in his territory.  He seems to
be considering your fate.

mobs.LongDesc: The head usher doesn't seem to care if you have a ticket or not.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The head usher is a rather overweight, unpleasant-looking man wearing a red jacket
that is several sizes too small.  His hair is greasy and he reeks of garlic and
popcorn grease.  His skin is very white and his pupils are very dilated.  You'
are not sure whether it is caused by being indoors all the time or from some
sort of narcotic.

mobs.LongDesc: The girl behind the concession counter looks at you blankly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The girl behind the candy counter is very overweight and you have to wonder if
she has been cutting into the theater's profits.  She is playing with her hair
with her plump fingers and is busily chewing on something.  Her face is covered
with acne, possibly from all of the popcorn grease and oil.  All in all, you
aren't sure you want to buy anything from her.

mobs.LongDesc: A bum is sleeping here in the back row.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This old bum sleeping here is rather old and is shivering under a tattered blanket.
He is snoring loudly and has his feet resting on the seat in front of him.
You can detect a faint, rancid odor coming from his direction.  Perhaps you can
find a seat a little further up front.

mobs.LongDesc: Someone's llama has been tethered here on the street.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Yes indeed, this is a real honest-to-goodness llama.  One of the few
remaining domesticated animals on Earth that are real and not replicated,
these nimble creatures are eaten by some people, milked by some others,
and worshipped by yet some others.  You've never tried a llama steak and
the rather sinewy creature does not look like it could produce a good steak.

mobs.LongDesc: A beautiful girl dances slowly in front of you with her eyes closed.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young girl looks around 18 or so and is truly beautiful.  She is wearing a
spectacular black silk kimono with red and green dragons entwined across the
front and back.  Her feet are bare and her long black hair reaches almost to
her knees.  She is swaying slowly to the music with her eyes closed and doesn't
notice you staring at her.

mobs.LongDesc: A sweaty slam dancer is hurling himself through the air near the stage.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy has to be completely insane.  He is bleeding from several cuts all over
his body and his shaved head is covered with some sort of intricate tatoo.  He
has the usual piercings and studs and can leap impossibly high into the air.
His face has the glazed look of someone under a narcotic influence and he is
moshing about without showing any signs of getting tired.

mobs.LongDesc: A techno geek is dancing spastically and bumps into you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy is flailing about spastically with an absolutely stony look on his face.
He is dressed completely in black and has his hair slicked back above his thick,
dark glasses.  You've heard rumors that some of these techno freaks have their
joints surgically altered to allow them to dance with impossibly bizarre moves.
You have an odd feeling that this dancer has had some work done!

mobs.LongDesc: The offduty policeman sitting here drinking looks at you intently.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This policeman is hopefully off duty as he is drinking and wearing a long
raincoat over his uniform.  He isn't making any attempt to conceal his uniform
so he can't be working undercover.  He is probably working security for Taffy
on his off hours.  In any case, he looks alert and dangerous.

mobs.LongDesc: A beautifully dressed personnel specialist glances up and smiles at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This middle-aged woman is attractive and elegantly dressed in the typical business
suit that is favored by the corporate climbers that fill the Tyrell Corporation.
She looks efficient, friendly, and capable.  Perhaps you might talk her into
giving you a job?

mobs.LongDesc: A sweating Tyrell courier looks unsure as to where to make his delivery.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young man is dressed in the typical mailroom outfit, a cheap suit.  He looks
kinda confused and is sweating slightly.  You get the distinct impression that
he needs to deliver something quickly but is not completely sure where he is
supposed to go.  You feel a pang of sympathy for the poor guy, as the Tyrell
Corporate Headquarters is a massive building.

mobs.LongDesc: This genetic engineer is dressed in a lab coat and a perpetual scowl.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This middle-aged man is one of the thousands of genetic engineers employed by the
Tyrell Corporation.  He must be one of the better ones since he is working here
in Research and Development.  He is wearing the typical lab coat and thick
glasses of his colleagues.  You are not sure, but the ill-fitting lab coat may
be concealing a sidearm.  You wonder why he would need one here in the lab?

mobs.LongDesc: This young lab technician is very busy and doesn't notice you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young lab technician looks a bit flustered as he follows instructions from
the genetic engineers and senior scientists here in the Research and Development
Labs.  He is wearing a somewhat frayed lab coat and a glazed expression as he
operates the various scientific devices in the lab.

mobs.LongDesc: A petite biochemist is busy testing some tissue samples.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This petite woman is working busily testing tissue samples with some exotic
scientific equipment.  Her hair is tied back away from her face which is fairly
fixed in a look of intense concentration.  Her hands are moving quickly and
confidently and she doesn't seem to know you have walked into the room.

mobs.LongDesc: Intel Gates wonders what type of neural implant you want.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This gnarled little man is dressed in dark, electro-chameleon clothing
that makes him appear to fade in and out of the shadows.  His skull is
heavily wired and there are at least four implants wired into his skull,
three more than is legal.  You can't help be curious about what kind of
black market implants he has for sale.

mobs.LongDesc: Apu the tatoo artist is picking his teeth with the tatoo needle.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Apu, the proprietor of this tatoo parlow looks like he is from India.
Dark and swarthy, all of his exposed skin is covered with beautiful, colored
tatoos of outstanding artistry.  Apu glances at you and your lack of any
visible tatoos and sniffs disapprovingly.  He says, "Please, not to be
playing with the tatooing equipment."

mobs.LongDesc: A beautiful geisha smiles at you demurely.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young woman is dressed in the traditional clothes and makeup of
the classic Japanese geisha.  Her skin is startling white and her long black
hair hangs down to her waist.  If she is truly a working girl, she must be
extremely expensive.

mobs.LongDesc: The stage manager is wringing his hands, looking for the next act.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The stage manager is a fussy, slightly effeminant man who is dashing
about trying to round up the next dancer or act for the stage show.  He is
sweating and fanning himself with a little black fan.  For some reason, you
feel like smacking the little squirt just for being there.

mobs.LongDesc: The wardrobe mistress is busy stitching up some costume.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The wardrobe is a matronly woman who is dressed in a rather severe suit
and has her grey hair piled high on her head.  She has several pins
clenched between her teeth and she is staring at her work intently through
extraordinarily thick glasses.  You are tempted to call her "Granny."

mobs.LongDesc: A policeman stands here cooly behind his dark sunglasses.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This policeman is dressed in the standard uniform utilities.  His pants
are sharply pressed and his boots shine like a mirror.  He struts a bit as
he walks, and glances into anything that might reflect his image.

mobs.LongDesc: A mutant gerbil springs at you with amazing speed.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This looks like a normal gerbil, although a bit larger than most you
have seen.  It has unusually long teeth and claws, and its eyes almost seem
to glow with an inner light.  It looks mean, nasty, and it is springing
towards your throat with its fangs bared.

mobs.LongDesc: A tired businessman rubs his eyes and continues walking.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This middle-aged man looks tired and somewhat damp from the incessant rain here
in Los Angeles.  He is wearing a business suit with overcoat and looks like he'd
rather be just about anywhere else than here.  He walks slowly and ponderously and
doesn't look at anyone as he goes.

mobs.LongDesc: An Offworld tourist is trying to look inconspicuous here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This tourist is obviously from one of the OffWorld colonies.  She must
be slumming as most OffWorlders rarely return to earth with its crowds
and crime and pollution.  You get the distinct impression that she is
here for less than legal reasons, perhaps to buy something illegal
that can't be purchased anywhere else.

mobs.LongDesc: An optic technician doesn't appear to notice you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Wearing a white lab coat, a collar docimeter, and thick rubber-soled
shoes, the optic technician behind the counter certainly looks the
part of a neural chip mechanic.  He is standing completely still and
does not appear to notice that you have walked into the store.

mobs.LongDesc: A middle-aged executive is sitting here smoking a cigar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy has it all.  The power suit, the power haircut, the power tie, 
and the big nasty cigar.  He looks very rich, impeccably groomed, and very
very confident and smug.  You resist the temptation to smack him across the
face.

mobs.LongDesc: An opium head sits here with a glazed expression on her face.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This haggard looking creature is dressed in a smart business suit and
is drooling heavily onto it as she sits in the corner.  Obviously heavily
under the influence, she wavers from side to side in the thick fumes and
seems to be mumbling something under her breath.

mobs.LongDesc: A tired bartender is quietly wiping some glasses behind the bar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The bartender has a frozen smile on his face but looks very very tired.
He is wearing a tuxedo that is impeccably pressed and shows no signs
of wear and tear.  He is cleaning some glasses somewhat absent-mindedly
while he stares off into the distance.

mobs.LongDesc: Mistress Sonja cracks her whip and says, "Submit Worm."
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mistress Sonja is dressed from head to foot in black latex and leather.
Her somewhat overvoluptuous figure is barely concealed by her tightly
cinched garments and she stares at you with an icy stare.  She flicks
a small whip against the side of her leg and considers her plans
for you.  Something in her expression makes your flesh crawl.

mobs.LongDesc: The flesh-like floor undulates under your feet.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
What first appeared as a cushioned floor appears, on close inspection,
as an actual mat of living flesh.  It is very warm to the touch and
you can actually see veins and arteries running through it.  It undulates
slowly and you notice that it is darker around your feet.

mobs.LongDesc: A grim-looking Tyrell security guard is on alert here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This tough-looking guard is big and muscular and is watching everyone
and everything like a hawk.  He moves almost silently, like a cat, as
he inconspicuously patrols the floor.  You are safe assuming he is
well-armed and well trained.

mobs.LongDesc: A pretty travel agent smiles at you and asks, "Can I help you?"
A uniformed cop stands here looking tired and angry.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This cop must have had a really bad day.  He looks careworn, exhausted,
and angry at the world.  His black uniform is wet from the incessant rain
here in the city and he leaves damp footprints behind him as he walks.  Best
not to get in his way . . .

mobs.LongDesc: A pit bull leaps from the shadows with a vicious howl.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This unusually large pit bull is barking and snarling frantically as it
hurls itself toward you.  It is on a heavy chain attached to the floor
and was probably placed here to guard something.  Its jaws look very
powerful and you wonder if it is a real dog or an enhanced, genetically
engineered dog.

mobs.LongDesc: A Century 22 Real Estate agent smiles at you with a phoney smile.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Century 22 real estate agent looks like a real operator.  From
his slicked back hair and his poorly capped teeth, he looks about as
honest as a used car salesman.  He just might have some freshly
drained swampland in Floriday at a great price for you!
